name: Ignis (itch)
description:
Keep Ignis alive absorbing fireplaces energy around you. Hide behind obstacles or burn out in wind. Watch out falling trees, they might take precious energy from your. Open up the portal within your own spirit and move forward. Don't stop, keep going.. good luck.

This game won the 2nd prize on TK Game Jam 2018. We're still working on it so stay tuned.

Created by:

Dominik Jatczyński  / Konrad Karolczyk / Marcin Markowicz / Marcin Synal / Adrian Ślusarek / Paweł Tomaszewski
